summary: The module provides the data model layer for the docling library, defining Pydantic-based structures that represent pages with image data and geometric metadata, as well as comprehensive document models that detect formats and MIME types, coordinate conversion through backend services, and encapsulate conversion results including legacy representations and profiling details.
business_intent: To establish a consistent, validated representation of document pages and whole documents, facilitating reliable format detection, conversion orchestration, and result tracking across the docling system.
